lead_paragraph: Australia's bowlers ripped through Sri Lanka's brittle batting order to dismiss the home side for 117 on an eventful first day of the opening test at Pallekele on Tuesday that also saw the visitors lose their openers for just seven runs.

headline.print_headline: Australia Dismiss Sri Lanka for 117 in Opener
headline.main: Australia Dismiss Sri Lanka for 117 in Opener

snippet: Australia's bowlers ripped through Sri Lanka's brittle batting order to dismiss the home side for 117 on an eventful first day of the opening test at Pallekele on Tuesday that also saw the visitors lose their openers for just seven runs....
